title: Haddock with parsley and whisky sauce
ingredients: ['4 haddock fillets, skinned, about 115g (4oz) each', '1 tablespoon dry white wine', '1 blade of mace', '2-3 parsley stalks (use leaves in sauce)', '2-3 chives', '1 bay leaf', '½ teaspoon green or black peppercorns', 'For the sauce', '1 small handful of parsley leaves', '1 small handful of spinach leaves', '2-3 chives', '1 teaspoon capers', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon whisky', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '½ teaspoon mustard', 'Salt and black pepper', '½ teaspoon sugar (optional)']
